scripts.build: yarn build:lib && yarn build:wc && yarn build:wca
scripts.build:lib: vue-cli-service build src/components/ConferenceCal.vue --target lib --name ConferenceCal --dest dist/lib
scripts.build:wc: vue-cli-service build src/components/ConferenceCal.vue --target wc --name conference-cal --dest dist/wc/
scripts.build:wca: vue-cli-service build src/components/ConferenceCal.vue --target wc-async --name conference-cal --dest dist/wca/
